[Space Ranger](https://sketchfab.com/models/c77bb570b3d24fb397f4af10651a34db) by [marex333](https://sketchfab.com/marex333) on [Sketchfab](https://sketchfab.com)

**Download** - [LINK](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/233195-space-ranger)

niesamowite!

 I saw this in your latest video. Cool little rover man with a super cool entry method! Although I don't like the parts that clip into the wheels. I don't think it's necessary anymore.
Amazing Craft. So Simple, Yet very sleek. +rep

Cute Little Buggy Dude!

JR

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T15:40:32Z" title="07/27/2015 03:40  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by Jolly\_Roger**

Nice! 

Its funny how the poor kerble has to look at potentially gruesome warning labels the whole time.

Oh well its not like they pay attention to them!

I am using this buggy until I build one myself. 

+rep

> 
> niesamowite!
>  I saw this in your latest video. Cool little rover man with a super cool entry method! Although I don't like the parts that clip into the wheels. I don't think it's necessary anymore.

I clipped them, but... I added my developed suspension idea, so the ride is softer ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Nice! 
> Its funny how the poor kerble has to look at potentially gruesome warning labels the whole time.
> 
> Oh well its not like they pay attention to them!

They got screen (sun energy recharge panel) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So we can pretend that they see through cameras ;d
cool outside and nice inside two.

Wow! Very clever use of air brakes. Now that I see it I feel like I should have thought of that xD

If you don't mind I feel like your technique ought to be detailed in the "Open Source Construction Techniques" thread.

> 
> Wow! Very clever use of air brakes. Now that I see it I feel like I should have thought of that xD
> If you don't mind I feel like your technique ought to be detailed in the "Open Source Construction Techniques" thread.

No problem mate ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
